actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: Resolution on the Hawaii triangle coach fares.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that, during the period pending investigation and action by the Civil Aeronautics Board on an order suspending a proposal by Western airlines to extend its Hawaii triangle coach fares beyond the current expiration date of May 31, 1974, Western Airlines be granted an extension of its Hawaii triangle fares.

titles.title: Resolution on the Hawaii triangle coach fares.
